de.javasoft.swing.jytable.sort
Class SortIconProvider

java.lang.Object
  de.javasoft.swing.jytable.sort.SortIconProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISortIconProvider
public class SortIconProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISortIconProvider

Implementation of SortIconProvider for use with JYTable. It can decorate the default sort icon as provided by the UIManager with the sortIndex. If so, it internally uses a JLabel to create the decorated icon.

getSortIcon

public javax.swing.Icon getSortIcon(javax.swing.JComponent component,
                                    int column,
                                    boolean withText)
Description copied from interface: ISortIconProvider
Returns an Icon according to the sort status of the given column. May be null if unsorted.

Specified by:
getSortIcon in interface ISortIconProvider
Parameters:
component - the component to decorate with a sort marker
column - the columnIndex in view coordinates
withText - a flag indicating whether the icon should be decorated with the sort index
Returns:
an Icon to use in a sort marker in the context of the given component
